title: Yanyaka Sanpo
alternative_title: やにゃか さんぽ ; もっと やにゃかさんぽ ; Yanaka histoires de chats ; Yanyaka's Walks ; Yanyaka's Walks in Yanaka Neighborhood
status: やにゃか さんぽ ; もっと やにゃかさんぽ ; Yanaka histoires de chats ; Yanyaka's Walks ; Yanyaka's Walks in Yanaka Neighborhood
description:
Description :
        The new kid in the group arrives in the magnificent traditional and popular district of Yanaka (Yanaka 谷中 in Taito-city 台東区 in Tokyo).Unable to correctly pronounce the name of the neighborhood, his new friends decide to nickname him *Ya**nya**ka*.Accompanied by Edo, the senior who knows everything about everything, and Mikey, the full of energy of the group, our hero shows us all of the little treasures of this exceptional district of Tokyo.Between tradition and fits of laughter, follow the adventures of this merry group which will continue to grow over the pages.*A manga / travel guide, for one of the most beautiful districts of the Japanese capital.*

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 3: The Okakura Tenshin Memorial Park
Vol.1 Chapter 2: Tsuijibei, The Interesting Wall
